name: Second Manor
description:
WARNING: May contain loud sound(s).

Following the events of Luniere, our protagonist and her friend, Solaire, have entered Pengu's Manor to spend some quality time with their friend Pengu. Things don't go as planned, however, and it's up to our protagonists to save the day! 

Controls:

  • WASD - Movement
  • Spacebar/1/2 - Switch Characters
  • Left Mouse Button - Interact
    • Click on another character to make them Follow/Stay
  • F / Right Mouse Button - Use Equipped Item
  • Tab - Show HP

Credits:

  • Branchi - Art, Music, Sound effects
  • srg - Programming, Gameplay
  • Crusoki - Voice acting

Game is a follow-up to our previous game, Luniere: https://essarrgee.itch.io/luniere
